casebody.data:
Franco Costa, v Fantasia Distributing Corporation et al.

Motion, insofar as it seeks reargument, denied, and insofar as it seeks leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted and the following question certified: “Was the order of the Supreme^Court, as affirmed by this court properly made?” Concur — Birns, J.P., Sullivan, Markewich and Fein, JJ.
